title: kokaq
description: kokaq is an open source, distributed, cloud-native priority queue implementation, designed to solve the long-standing gap of native priority handling in cloud messaging systems. It’s built for high availability, low latency, and intelligent resource allocation — empowering mission-critical workflows with dynamic, weight-based prioritization.

featureHighlights.title: Native Priority Queue Support
featureHighlights.description: Prioritize tasks and messages based on their true importance — no workarounds or consumer hacks required.

featureHighlights.title: Non-Discrete Priorities
featureHighlights.description: Fine-grained control using continuous, weight-based priority values instead of fixed levels.

featureHighlights.title: Cloud-Native Architecture
featureHighlights.description: Built from the ground up on Kubernetes and other modern cloud environments, leveraging serverless and container-native workflows.

featureHighlights.title: Low Latency & High Availability
featureHighlights.description: Designed to handle latency-sensitive and real-time workloads with minimal delay and strong reliability.

featureHighlights.title: Strict Highest-Priority-First Model
featureHighlights.description: Ensures that the most important messages are always processed first, deterministically.

featureHighlights.title: SLA-Aware Resource Efficiency
featureHighlights.description: Prevents resource waste by adjusting queue behavior based on time-bound message SLAs.

featureHighlights.title: Service Integration Ready
featureHighlights.description: Seamlessly connects with Azure Functions, AWS Lambda, Cloud Functions.

featureHighlights.title: Observability and Insights
featureHighlights.description: Built-in support for real-time monitoring through OpenTelemetry.
